name: edge-rules-demos
description: Helper scripts to build and run EdgeRules WASM demos

scripts.build:wasm:node: wasm-pack build --release --target nodejs -- --features wasm && wasm-opt -Oz pkg/edge_rules_bg.wasm -o pkg/edge_rules_bg.opt.wasm || true
scripts.build:wasm:web: wasm-pack build --release --target web -- --features wasm && wasm-opt -Oz pkg/edge_rules_bg.wasm -o pkg/edge_rules_bg.opt.wasm || true
